text: Terence Cooper (12 July 1944 â€“ 31 July 2021) was an English football player and manager. He was born in Brotherton, West Riding of Yorkshire. He made twenty appearances for the England national team between 1969 until 1974. He also played for Leeds United and Middlesbrough. Cooper also managed Bristol City. Cooper died on 31 July 2021 at the age of 77.RIP Terry Cooper ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:Bristol Rovers F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Yorkshire
title: Terry Cooper (footballer, born 1944)
